answers.answer: I wanted to clarify that I do not have high blood pressure, I do not have diabetes, and I am a normal weight.  140lbs 5'6

Hey, I just wanted to say this has been happening to me too.  My raised lump got so big on Sat that it popped & blood was coming from my eye.  It started to heal after it popped, but I just sneezed & it is back.  Have you ever had this problem with the blood coming out?
Sneezing is one of the cause of subconjunctival hemmorrahge.  If it always in the same area you may have a weak blood vessel.  Cauthery may help.Dr. O.

question: It seems that when I occasionally sneeze, there is so much pressure it causes the inside of my right eye to hemmorhage and fill with blood.  Visine does nothing.  I saw my eye doctor about this and that was all he prescribed to me.  he had actually never seen this before.  You can actually see a raised lump with blood around it.  It usually takes 5 days to clear up.  This started about a year ago when I used to cover my nose when I sneezed and now I no longer cover my nose and i have found this to help, but it seems to be happening even when i don't cover my nose.Is there something I can do to remedy this?
title: Sneezing that causes right inside of eye to hemmorhage
